sections.label: ğŸš€ Improvements
items: âœ“ Global filter dynamically replaced by âœ“ Regexp filter, âœ“ Case-sensitive filter, âœ“ Exclude filter, or combinations thereof when the respective checkboxes are active

items.text: ShowAllEntityData: createInfoDialog() shared factory for info dialogs
sub: New createInfoDialog(opts) function encapsulates all structure, behaviour, and wiring shared by lightweight info dialogs: draggable title bar, focusable scroll area (tabIndex + mouseenterâ†’focus for native â†‘â†“/PageUp/PageDown/Home/End), sticky close-hint footer, Escape-key handler, click-outside handler (100 ms delay), and full document-listener cleanup on close
titleBarExtras[] option allows callers to inject controls (e.g. ğŸ”„ Force refresh) left of the âœ• button; e.target.closest('button, a') guard prevents drag initiation on any such control
centerV option: true (default) centres vertically via translate(-50%,-50%); false positions at top:60px for dialogs that sit below the page header
showShortcutsHelp() rewritten as a thin wrapper â€” now also draggable (was not before)
showAppHelp() rewritten as a thin wrapper â€” all manual drag/Escape/click-outside boilerplate removed; behaviour preserved

items.text: Keyboard scrolling restored in Shortcuts and App Help dialogs
sub: Both scrollable areas (scrollArea in showShortcutsHelp, contentArea in showAppHelp) now carry tabIndex=0 and outline:none so the browser can give them keyboard focus
A mouseenter listener calls .focus() on the scroll container whenever the mouse enters, so â†‘ â†“ PageUp PageDown Home End all work natively without any manual scroll math
No interference with existing Escape / click-outside close handlers

items.text: Blinking text-caret in â“ Application Help button eliminated
sub: uiHelpBtnCSS() now appends user-select:none; -webkit-user-select:none; to its returned CSS string
Some browsers treated the â“ emoji glyph as a selectable text node inside the inline-flex button and rendered a blinking I-beam caret; making the content non-selectable suppresses this

items.text: Dialog UX: unified sticky close-hint footer
sub: Keyboard Shortcuts dialog: moved 'Click outside or press Escape to close' hint out of the scrollable content area into a dedicated flex-shrink:0 footer sibling â€” the hint now stays visible while scrolling
Application Help & Feature Overview dialog: replaced the 'Close' button footer with the same sticky divider + close-hint footer pattern used in the Shortcuts dialog

Application Help & Feature Overview dialog: implemented click-outside-to-close handler (with 100 ms delay to avoid the opening click triggering an immediate close); closeDialog() now also removes the click-outside listener on teardown

items.text: Help dialog: Force refresh
sub: Added ğŸ”„ Force refresh link in title bar (left of âœ•)
Bypasses GM cache and downloads latest help text from GitHub in-place
loadAndRender() now accepts forceRefresh boolean parameter
Extended info-level logging: URL, source (cache / network), byte size, stale-cache warnings

items.text: Popup dialogs refactored to VZ_MBLibrary
sub: All 5 call sites now use Lib.showCustomAlert() / Lib.showCustomConfirm()
Local showCustomDialog / showCustomAlert / showCustomConfirm removed

sections.label: ğŸ§¹ Cleanup

Removed local popupDialogCSS / popupHeaderCSS / popupMessageCSS / popupOkBtnCSS / popupCancelBtnCSS helpers

sections.label: âš¡ Performance
